snippet: The winner of the Derby, Orb, had a solid workout, setting up a contest with the Preakness winner Oxbow and as many as five Todd Pletcher-trained entrants.
abstract: Kentucky Derby winner Orb has solid workout, convincing trainer Shug McGaughey that he is fit enough to race in Belmont Stakes after finishing fourth in Preakness; sets up contest at Belmont against Preakness winner Oxbow; trainer Todd Pletcher has as many as five entrants in Belmont field.
lead_paragraph: The winner of the Derby, Orb, had a solid workout, setting up a contest with the Preakness winner Oxbow and as many as five Todd Pletcher-trained entrants.

headline.seo: Orb to Run in Belmont, but Plenty of Competitors Await
headline.main: Kentucky Derby Winner Looks Sharp and Will Join the Belmont’s Field
headline.print_headline: Kentucky Derby Winner Looks Sharp and Will Join the Belmont’s Crowded Field
